dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.risk.sec.inc.SecurityIncident
dataStructure.description:
An unplanned interruption to an IT Service or reduction in the Quality of an IT Service, including loss of confidentiality, integrity, or availability due to unauthorized entry or an information attack on an information system. It includes unauthorized probing and browsing; disruption or denial of service; altered or destroyed input, processing, storage, or output of information; or changes to information system hardware, firmware, or software characteristics with or without the users' knowledge, instruction, or intent.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: SecurityIncident

child.name: intiallyReportedDateTime
child.description:
Date and time initially reported.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is mandatory

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: intiallyReportedDateTime

child.name: validFor
child.description:
Assessment of start and end date/time event activity associated with this incident occurred.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor

child.name: initialDetectionDateTime
child.description:
Date/time initial detection of activity occurred associated with this incident.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is mandatory

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: initialDetectionDateTime

child.name: isFalsePositive
child.description:
Boolean for the evaluation whether this incident is a false positive or not.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: isFalsePositive

child.name: isExercise
child.description:
Indicates whether this incident is real or part of an exercise (i.e. part of a test of an organization's security posture).

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: isExercise

child.name: exerciseDescription
child.description:
If the incident is part of an exercise, this attribute describes that exercise.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: exerciseDescription

child.name: lastUpdateDateTime
child.description:
Last date/time the incident was updated.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: lastUpdateDateTime

child.name: status
child.description:
Free-text analyst description of the current status of the incident

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is mandatory

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: status

child.name: synopsis
child.description:
Free text synopsis for analyst notes

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: synopsis

child.name: detectionMethod
child.description:
Method used for detection (e.g. user report, detected by sensor, network flow analysis)

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is mandatory

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: detectionMethod

child.name: targetUsedAs
child.description:
Description of the how the compromised resource was used by the attacker.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: targetUsedAs

child.name: troubleTicket
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association SecurityIncidentReferences

This association end is optional
child.label: troubleTicket
